caption: Lost Coast Trail
description:
• Difficulty: Strenuous (Hiking on Sand)
  • Distance: 15 - 28 miles
  • Water Available: Plenitful
  • Elevation Gain/loss: Minimal (point to poin)
cautionary:
• High Tide
  • Extreme Weather Shifts
  • Addiitonal clothing (You will be wet!)

caption: Lake Jamison/Rock Lake
description:
• Difficulty: Easy (after initial elevation gain)
  • Distance: 7 miles
  • Water Available: Plentiful
  • Elevation Gain/loss: Mild
key_features:
• Water Fall
  • Swimming Hole
  • Very easy for first timers
  • Historic sites
cautionary:
• Getting to the waterfall poses challenges
  • Abundant Poison Oak

caption: Cliff Lake Sierra National Forest
description:
• Difficulty: Moderate
  • Distance: 8 miles
  • Water Available: Scarce
  • Elevation Gain/loss: High
cautionary:
• Very remote
  • Have a full tank of gas!
  • Only Water Source is at the lakes

caption: Tahoe Rim Trail
description:
• Difficulty: Moderate - Strenuous
  • Distance: 10 - 165 miles
  • Water Available: Plentiful
  • Elevation Gain/loss: Moderate
key_features:
• Views of Tahoe from many places
  • Many different segements to choose from
  • Flora-Fauna
cautionary:
• Weather is tempermental (snow in May)
  • Alot of unmarked trails easy to get lost

caption: Lassen Volcanic National Park
description:
• Difficulty: Moderate - strenuous
  • Distance: 15 - 40 miles
  • Water Available: Plentiful
  • Elevation Gain/loss: Moderate

caption: Little Sur River
description:
• Difficulty: Moderate
  • Distance: 5 - 9 miles
  • Water Available: Scarce
  • Elevation Gain/loss: Moderate
cautionary:
• Unkept Trails
  • No water until the falls
  • May have been effected by the Land Slides of 2017
